name: Ingredient Island
description:
Ingredient Island!

By Grind Digital

Submitted for the Gamedev.js Jam 2022

Explore, Gather Raw Ingredients, Create Raw Meals!

Synopsis

Welcome to ingredient Island where the fish are fresh and the fruit are just right. Unfortunately they have lost their head chief MewChow and ever since the food has not been the same so now it is up to his son MewChew too save the islands tastebuds and restore his fathers restaurant. Do you have what it takes to help MewChew explore the island and collect all the raw ingredients need to complete the islands master menu and restore his fathers restaurant. Only one way too find out!

Controls

Catch Fish - Click on them over and over to reel in!

Move around - arrow keys

Select Item from hotbar - 0 - 9

Throw Items - Z

Put Away Item / Take Out Item - A

Eat Food - S

Swing Axe - X

Try using the Coil API to donate to the game and get a free gift in-game!
